Sunshine Shop

about sunshine group

Established in 2009, Sunshine Equipment was known as an importer and distributor of industrial kitchen, bar and laundry equipments of well-known brands in the world.

Western/Asian management for a better understanding off all kind of customer’s expectations.

A dedicated and experienced After Sales Service Team for immediate expertise and action, supported by our Hot Line permanency 7 days per week.

Best International Expert’s network for consultancy, advises and support to biggest kitchen projects.

project

Our products have been the main equipment used in high-end hotel systems such as Sofitel, Novotel, Moevenpick, Hilton, Daewoo, Equatorial, Park Royal, Hide Away ... and food processing enterprise such as Kinh Do, Duc Phat, Vissan ... as well as the system of bars, restaurants and cafeterias of schools and enterprises across the country.
